body_html:
The rmtree fails because the SummaryWriterCache keeps open file handles around which causes Windows to disallow removing the directory.

Look at estimator_test: test_train_save_copy_reload for an example of how to fix.

@ispirmustafa should we call SummaryWriterCache.clear() after each train()/eval() call? There's little we gain from this cache between invocations.
